name: 姚立德
objective:
1. 類神經網路簡介
2. 淺層類神經網路
3. 深層類神經網路之訓練
4. 深度學習與推論
5. 遞歸類神經網路
6. 長短期記憶類神經網路
7. 卷積類神經網路
8. 深度強化學習

1. Introduction to Neural Networks
2. Shallow Neural Networks
3. Training Deep Neural Networks
4. Teaching Deep Learners to Generalize
5. Recurrent Neural Networks
6. Long Short-term Memory Neural Networks
7. Convolutional Neural Networks
8. Deep Reinforcement Learning
schedule:
1. Introduction to Neural Networks (2 Wks)
2. Shallow Neural Networks (2 Wks)
3. Training Deep Neural Networks  (2 Wks)
4. Teaching Deep Learners to Generalize  (2 Wks)
5. Recurrent Neural Networks  (2 Wks)
6. Long Short-term Memory Neural Networks  (2 Wks)
7. Convolutional Neural Networks  (3 Wks)
8. Deep Reinforcement Learning  (3 Wks)
scorePolicy:
Three take-home programming exam. 
First exam: 30%
Second exam: 30%
Final exam: 40%
materials: Neural Networks and Deep Learning, Charu C. Aggarwal, Springer, 2018.
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG9：產業創新與基礎設施（Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure）
